Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering the investment we've made in its development and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $150. I trust that you will find its value exceeds this price and appreciate the opportunity to make it part of your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
